column1:
寝させておこう
しばらく

信子は疲れているからしばらく寝させておこう。
column2:
Since Nobuko is tired, let's let her sleep for a while.
- With a causative verb, Verbておく can express the idea that someone lets someone or something remain in his/its present state.
#暫くしばらく:
  • for a while; for some time
    (Adverb; usu. written as kana)
  • for a moment; for a minute
    (Adverb; Suru verb; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　姑くしばらく、暫らくしばらく、須臾しばらく

column1:
飲ませておきなさい
好きなだけ

飲みたいと言うのなら好きなだけ飲ませておきなさい。
column2:
If he says he wants to drink, let him drink as much as he likes.
- With a causative verb, Verbておく can express the idea that someone lets someone or something remain in his/its present state.
#好きなだけすきなだけ:
  • all you want; as much as one wants
    (Expression; Adverb)

column1:
飲ませておいた

私はボブにビールを飲ませておいた。
column2:
(A) I let (or make) Bob drink beer (for future convenience).
(B) I let Bob drink beer.
- However, if the context is not clear, causative Verbておく can be ambiguous.

column1: 見とく・読んどく
column2:
見ておく -> 見とく - see 〜 in advance
読んでおく -> 読んどく - read 〜 in advance

column1:
そうして

独りには慣れてるいつもそうしてきた
column2:
That's how it's always been. I'm used to it.
- ひとりにはなれてるいつもそうしてきた
#然うしてそうして:
  • and; like that
    (Conjunction; usu. written as kana)

column1:
そのうち
動き出す

そのうちあいつも動きだす
column2:
That thing's going to start moving again eventually.
- そのうちあいつもうごきだす
#その内そのうち:
  • before very long; soon; someday; one of these days; sooner or later
    (Expression; Adverb; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　其の内そのうち

#動き出すうごきだす:
  • to come alive; to get going; to start to move
    (Godan verb with su ending)
  • Other Forms　動きだすうごきだす

column1:
どのみち
全滅

そうなったらどのみちみんな全滅さ
column2:
And when it does, everyone here is gonna die either way.
- そうなったらどのみちみんなぜんめつさ
#どの道どのみち:
  • anyway; anyhow; at any rate; in any case
    (Adverb; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　何の道どのみち

#全滅ぜんめつ:
  • annihilation; total destruction; complete destruction; crushing defeat
    (Noun; Suru verb)

column1:
放っとく

君を放っとけない、１人で行かせられないよ
column2:
I'm not about to let you go alone.
- きみをほっとけない１にんでいかせられないよ
#放っとくほっとく:
  • to leave alone; to leave as is; to ignore; to neglect
    (Godan verb with ku ending; Transitive verb; Abbreviation; usu. written as kana)

column1:
覚悟

死ぬ覚悟あるの？
column2:
Are you prepared to die?
- しぬかくごあるの？
#覚悟かくご:
  • readiness; preparedness; resolution; resignation
    (Noun; Suru verb)

column1:
今のまま
どこにもない

でも今のままだったら俺には居場所なんてどこにもない
column2:
But as I am now, I don't belong anywhere.
- でもいまのままだったらおれにはいばしょなんてどこにもない
#今のまま:in the current state, as it is now
#何処にもないどこにもない:
  • nowhere
    (Expression; I-adjective; usu. written as kana)

column1:
気に入る
ドキドキする

その目気に入ったよドキドキする
column2:
I like the look in your eyes.It makes my heart race.
- そのめきにいったよどきどきする
#気に入るきにいる:
  • to like; to be pleased with; to be delighted with; to take a liking to; to suit one's fancy
    (Expression; Godan verb with ru ending)
  • Other Forms　気にいるきにいる

#ドキドキ:
  • thump-thump; bang-bang; pit-a-pat; pitapat; pitter-patter
    (Adverb; Adverb taking the 'to' particle; Onomatopoeic or mimetic word)
  • Other Forms　どきどき、どきんどきん、ドキンドキン

column1:
さあ
おいで
おいでなさい

さあおいで
column2:
Now come to me.
- さあおいで
#さあ:
  • well now; let's see; there we go; all right
    (Conjunction; said when surprised or happy)
  • Other Forms　さー、さぁ

#さあ:
  • well now; let's see; there we go; all right
    (Conjunction; said when surprised or happy)
  • Other Forms　さー、さぁ

#お出でおいで:
  • come; go; stay
    (Expression; used as an imperative, usu. to children and one's inferiors; Colloquialism; Abbreviation; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　御出でおいで

#お出でなさいおいでなさい:
  • come; go; stay
    (Expression; used as a polite imperative; usu. written as kana; Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo); Polite (teineigo))
  • Other Forms　御出でなさいおいでなさい

column1:
味わう
味わわせて

君を味わわせて
column2:
Let me get a taste of you.
- GT: 君を味わわせて = Let me taste you
- （ぜろつー）きみをあじわわせて
#味わわせる: to force someone to taste or experience
#味わうあじわう:
  • to taste; to savor; to savour; to relish
    (Godan verb with u ending; Transitive verb)

column1:
食う
食われる

食われた！
column2:
W-Was it eaten?
- GT: 食われた！ = I was eaten!
- （ごろー）く…くわれた！（ふらんくすはかせ）いや
#食われるくわれる:
  • to be eaten; to be bitten (e.g. by bugs)
    (Ichidan verb; intransitive verb)

#食うくう:
  • to eat
    (Godan verb with u ending; Transitive verb; Male term or language)
  • Other Forms　喰うくう、啖うくう

column1:
鋼鉄
乙女
鋼鉄の乙女
映し出す

鋼鉄の乙女はその本当の姿を映し出す
column2:
the iron maiden will reveal her true form.
- こうてつのおとめはそのほんとうのすがたをうつしだす
#鋼鉄こうてつ:
  • steel
    (Noun)

#少女しょうじょ:
  • little girl; maiden; young lady; female usually between 7 and 18 years old
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　小女しょうじょ、乙女おとめ

#映し出すうつしだす:
  • to project; to show
    (Godan verb with su ending; Transitive verb; esp. 映し...)
  • to portray; to depict; to describe; to reflect
    (Godan verb with su ending; Transitive verb; esp. 写し...)
  • Other Forms　写し出すうつしだす、映しだすうつしだす、写しだすうつしだす、うつし出すうつしだす

column1:
これぞ

これぞフランクス！美しい！最高だストレリチア！
column2:
Now this is a FRANXX!How truly beautiful!
- これぞふらんくす！うつくしい！さいこうだすとれりちあ！
#これぞ:
  • this
    (Expression; emphatic)

column1: とどめだ
column2:
Game over.
- （ぜろつー）とどめだ（すいっちをおすおと）
#止めとどめ:
  • finishing blow; coup de grâce
    (Noun; usu. written as kana)

column1:
ヒナ鳥

もう僕はヒナ鳥なんかじゃないだから今度は逃げない
column2:
I'm no longer a nestling. So I swore never to run away again.
- GT: I'm no longer a chick bird so I won't run away this time
- もうぼくはひなどりなんかじゃないだからこんどはにげない
#雛鳥ひなどり:
  • chick; baby bird
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　ひな鳥ひなどり

column1:
わざわざ
出迎える
出迎え

わざわざ出迎えしなくてもいいのに
column2:
You didn't have to wait out here for me.
- （ひろ）わざわざでむかえしなくてもいいのに
#態々わざわざ:
  • expressly; especially; taking the trouble (to do); going to the trouble of (doing); going out of one's way (to do)
    (Adverb; usu. written as kana)
  • intentionally; deliberately
    (Adverb; used to criticize someone's actions; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　態態わざわざ

#出迎えでむかえ:
  • meeting; reception
    (Noun)

#出迎えるでむかえる:
  • to meet; to greet
    (Ichidan verb; Transitive verb)

column1:
朝っぱらから
いなくなる

朝っぱらから勝手にいなくなんのが悪いんじゃん…
column2:
It's your fault for running off first thing in the morning.
- あさっぱらからかってにいなくなんのがわるいんじゃん…
#朝っぱらからあさっぱらから:
  • very early in the morning; so early in the morning; at this ungodly hour
    (Expression)

#居なくなるいなくなる:
  • to disappear (of people or animals); to go (away); to leave; to no longer exist
    (Expression; Godan verb with ru ending; usu. written as kana)

column1:
居づらい
ことになる

居づらくてもヒロはここに残ることになったんだから
column2:
Awkward as it is, you're staying here now.
- いづらくてもひろはここにのこることになったんだから
#居づらいいづらい:
  • difficult to be (in a place); not feeling like staying
    (Expression; I-adjective)
  • Other Forms　居辛いいづらい

#事になることになる:
  • to have been decided (so) that; to have been arranged (so) that
    (Expression; Godan verb with ru ending; usu. sentence ending; usu. written as kana)
  • to be the result (of); to be the outcome
    (Expression; Godan verb with ru ending; usu. written as kana)

column1:
隊
所属
ウチの隊

あの子ウチの隊所属じゃないんだよ
column2:
That girl isn't part of our squad, you know.
- GT: あの子ウチの隊所属じゃないんだよ = I don't belong to that child's corps
- もういちどって…あのこうちのたいしょぞくじゃないんだよ
#隊たい:
  • party; group; crew; team; body
    (Noun; Noun - used as a suffix)

#所属しょぞく:
  • belonging to (a group, organization, etc.); affiliation (with); being attached to; being under the control of
    (Noun; Suru verb; No-adjective)

column1:
気にしない
気にしないで

気にしない乗れればそれでいいよ
column2:
I don't care, as long as I get to pilot.
- きにしないのれればそれでいいよ
#気にしないきにしない:
  • not caring; not giving a damn
    (Expression; I-adjective)

#気にしないできにしないで:
  • don't worry about it; forget about it
    (Expression)

column1:
無事
済まない

無事じゃ済まなかったって…
column2:
They didn't make it out alive.
- GT: 無事じゃ済まなかったって… = It wasn't safe ...
- ぶじじゃすまなかったって…
#無事ぶじ:
  • safety; peace; quietness
    (Noun; Adverb; Na-adjective; No-adjective)

#済まないすまない:
  • inexcusable; unjustifiable; unpardonable
    (I-adjective; usu. written as kana)
  • sorry; remorseful; apologetic; conscience-stricken; contrite
    (I-adjective)

column1:
かどうか

ホントかどうかは分かんないけど
column2:
I don't know if that's true or not,
- ほんとかどうかはわかんないけど
#かどうか:
  • whether or not (in phrases like "I don't know whether or not I can come")
    (Expression)

column1:
早くしろ
例の子

おい、ヒロ早くしろ、例の子食堂に来てるぞ
column2:
Hey, Hiro. Get inside quick.
- you-know-who-girl
- GT: Hey, Hiro, I'm coming to the usual dining room soon
- GT: 早くしろ = hurry up
- （ごろー）おいひろはやくしろれいのこしょくどうにきてるぞ
#例のれいの:
  • the usual; as it always is
    (Pre-noun adjectival)
  • said; that (previously-mentioned person or object); aforementioned; you-know-(who, what, etc.)
    (Pre-noun adjectival)

column1:
血を引く

叫竜の血を引いてるって本当なのかな？
column2:
Do you think she really has klaxosaur blood?
- （いくの）さけびりゅうのちをひいてるってほんとうなのかな？
#血を引くちをひく:
  • to be descended from; to inherit (a disposition, etc.) from one's ancestors
    (Expression; Godan verb with ku ending)

column1:
うまくやる
自信
自信がある

うまくやれる自信があるぜ
column2:
I'm sure I can do a much better job than that wuss.
- うまくやれるじしんがあるぜ
#旨くやるうまくやる:
  • to manage something successfully; to be successful
    (Expression; Godan verb with ru ending; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　巧くやるうまくやる、甘くやるうまくやる

#自信じしん:
  • self-confidence; confidence (in oneself)
    (Noun; Suru verb)
